name: Heimdal
tagline: A easily administered configuration store with restful interface and tight integration into Spring
body:
### Welcome to Heimdal

Heimdal is a configuration store with a restful interface. This is the tool I use to manage my properties for
multiple apps and multiple envs. 

So far I only have a bit of it pushed to my repo, but what I have runs and has most of the infrastructure and
dependencies in place.

You can ignore the code below I am just keeping it in there as reference

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
### Feature List
Here is where I will put a list of what it can do

### Try Me
Here is where I will put install instructions

### Support or Contact
Here is where I will have a link or something to contact info
